member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.BasicMissile
member.summary:
Basic missile that will go from unit/location A to unit/location B.
The main feature for this missile is that missiles can arc.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.BasicMissile.Arc
member.summary:
The arc of the missile. Closely matches the object editor arc values.
If you want a fixed height arc, set the Arc equal to (arc height/distance to target).

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.BasicMissile.ReactivateArc
member.summary:
If the arc behaviour has or would disable itself (because of a large change in target position), you can forcefully re-activate it using this method.
Note: Will set the caster position to the missiles current position.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.BasicMissile.DisableArc
member.summary: Disables the arc and causes the missile to fly in a straight line towards the target.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile
member.summary:
Advanced missile that allows for arcing/curving motions, i.e. a boomerang motion.
If you do not use the property, you should use instead for greater performance and identical features.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.Arc
member.summary:
The arc of the missile. Closely matches the object editor arc values.
If you want a fixed height arc, set the Arc equal to (arc height/distance to target).

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.curve
member.summary: The internal curve of the projectile in radians.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.Curve
member.summary: The curve of the projectile in degrees. This alters the arc, a 90 or -90 degree curve is a boomerang.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.originX
member.summary: The internal X of the missile without the arc/curve.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.originY
member.summary: The internal Y of the missile without the arc/curve.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.originZ
member.summary: The internal Z of the missile without the arc/curve.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.ReactivateArc
member.summary:
If the arc behaviour has or would disable itself (because of a large change in target position), you can forcefully re-activate it using this method.
Note: Will set the caster position to the missiles current position.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.CurveMissile.DisableArc
member.summary: Disables the arc and causes the missile to fly in a straight line towards the target.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.HomingMissile
member.summary:
Homing missile with a fixed speed that will attempt to aim itself at the target, restricted by turn speed.
Note: Does not have any behaviour to avoid endlessly circling the enemy. I recommend using it with a collision radius or such so that exact collisions aren't required.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.HomingMissile.turnRate
member.summary: The internal rate at which the missile can turn in radians per second.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.HomingMissile.TurnRate
member.summary: The rate at which the missile can turn in degrees per second.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.HomingMissile.InitialAngle
member.summary: The initial angle in degrees. If left at null, will default to the angle towards the target.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile
member.summary:
Fundamental missile class that provides the properties and methods that are shared by (virtually) all missiles.
Unless you wish to define a new movement pattern for missiles, you should use one of the derived classes instead.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Active
member.summary: Whether the missile is active. This is automatically set to false prior to calling .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Caster
member.summary: The caster, if it exists.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CastingPlayer
member.summary:
The owner of the caster. Automatically set on launch.
Does NOT update automatically! If this is desired, you can use .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CasterX
member.summary: The X coordinate from which the missile was fired.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CasterY
member.summary: The Y coordinate from which the missile was fired.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CasterZ
member.summary:
The Z coordinate from which the missile was fired.
By default, this is equal to UnitFlyHeight + + GetLocationZ.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CasterLaunchZ
member.summary: Use this to adjust the origin height of the missile when firing, as it will by default fire from the ground (plus unit flying height).

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Target
member.summary: The target, if it exists. If the target dies during travel, this is set to null.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.TargetPlayer
member.summary:
The owner of the target. Automatically set on launch.
Does NOT update automatically! If this is desired, you can use .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.TargetX
member.summary: The X coordinate that this missile is moving towards. While is alive, this will automatically be updated.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.TargetY
member.summary: The Y coordinate that this missile is moving towards. While is alive, this will automatically be updated.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.TargetZ
member.summary:
The Z coordinate that this missile is moving towards. While is alive, this will automatically be updated.
By default, this is equal to UnitFlyHeight + + GetLocationZ.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.TargetImpactZ
member.summary: Use this to adjust the target height of the missile, as it will by default aim towards the ground (plus unit flying height).

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.MissileX
member.summary:
The current X position of the missile.
Depending on the type of missile, MissileX sets may be ignored.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.MissileY
member.summary:
The current Y position of the missile.
Depending on the type of missile, MissileY sets may be ignored.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.MissileZ
member.summary:
The current Z position of the missile.
Depending on the type of missile, MissileZ sets may be ignored.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.speed
member.summary: The internal speed field. Defined in units per .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Speed
member.summary: The speed of the missile. Defined in units per second.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.ImpactLeeway
member.summary:
By default impact triggers when the distance is less than the missile's speed per tick.
Use this to increase that distance by a static number (default 0).

summary.para: Keeps track of all units collided with thus far.
Null if has never been set to a value greater than 0.
Removing a unit from this means will trigger for that unit once more.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CollisionRadius
member.summary:
The collision radius of the missile which is used to trigger .
Leave at default (0) to disable. Will ignore values below 0.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Interval
member.summary: The interval at which the missile will call . Leave at default (0) to disable.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.IntervalLeft
member.summary: The time left until the next call to .

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.spinPeriod
member.summary: The internal spin period field. Defined in radians per .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.SpinPeriod
member.summary:
The amount of time it takes for the projectile to spin once during flight in seconds.
Use negative values to go clockwise.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Yaw
member.summary:
The yaw of the projectile. Defined in degrees.
Depending on the type of missile, yaw sets may be ignored.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Pitch
member.summary:
The pitch of the projectile. Defined in degrees.
Depending on the type of missile, pitch sets may be ignored.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Roll
member.summary:
The roll of the projectile. Defined in degrees.
Depending on the type of missile, roll sets may be ignored.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.CurrentAngle
member.summary: Identical to .

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.effectString
member.summary: Internal effect string.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.EffectString
member.summary:
The effect string of the missile. If empty/null, the missile will be invisible.
If changed mid-flight, automatically modifies the missile.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.effectScale
member.summary: Internal effect scale. Used only when there is no effect present yet.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.EffectScale
member.summary:
The effect scale of the missile.
If changed mid-flight, automatically modifies the missile.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Effect
member.summary: The effect being used by the missile. Creation of the effect should be done by setting , not by setting this property.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.missileZ
member.summary: The Z of the missile without accounting for terrain.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.casterZ
member.summary: The Z of the caster without accounting for terrain.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.targetZ
member.summary: The Z of the target without accounting for terrain.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.#ctor(War3Api.Common.unit,War3Api.Common.unit)
member.summary:
Creates a new missile instance with the given parameters.
Will automatically set , , , , and .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.#ctor(War3Api.Common.unit,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary:
Creates a new missile instance with the given parameters.
Will automatically set , and .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.#ctor(War3Api.Common.player,System.Single,System.Single,War3Api.Common.unit)
member.summary:
Creates a new missile instance with the given parameters.
Will automatically set , and .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.#ctor(War3Api.Common.player,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new missile instance with the given parameters.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Launch
member.summary: Called by the system. Do not call yourself.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Action
member.summary: Called by the system. Do not call yourself.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.ExitWorldBounds
member.summary: Should be called when the missile would exit world bounds.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.RunInterval
member.summary: Runs the Interval related code. Do not call if is 0.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.RunCollisions
member.summary: Runs the Collision related code. Do not call if is 0.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.Impact
member.summary: Sets the missile position to that of the target and runs the interval, collision and impact code.

summary.para: Override this method if your missile has an effect that should trigger when colliding with another unit.
For this to be active, must be greater than 0.
Note that there is no filter on this collision. This is called whenever it collides with anything not in .
Before this method is called, the is added to .

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.OnDispose
member.summary: Override this method if your missile has an effect that should trigger when it is destroyed for any reason.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.OnImpact
member.summary:
Override this method if your missile has an impact effect.
is automatically set to false prior to calling this method. If you do not want the missile to end, you need to set back to true.

summary.para: Override this method if your missile has a periodic effect.
For this to be active, must be greater than 0.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.Missile.GetZ(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Retrieves the LocationZ at the given (X, Y) coordinates.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.MissileSystem
member.summary: Tracks and runs all active instances.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.MissileSystem.Missiles
member.summary: All active missiles.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.MissileSystem.Add(WCSharp.Missiles.Missile)
member.summary: Adds the given to the system.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Missiles.MissileSystem.RegisterForOwnershipChanges
member.summary:
By default, and are not updated when a unit changes owner.
This adds an event to pass over all missiles and update and on ownership changes.
This will ignore ownership changes of unit type 'xxxx' (WCSharp's dummy unit type).

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile
member.summary:
Homing-type missile that is based on momentum. Every tick, it will accelerate itself towards the target, up to a maximum speed.
Note that the actual acceleration when adjusting its angle towards the target can be significantly less than specified.
It is recommended to use at least a little bit of when using this missile.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile.InitialAngle
member.summary: The initial angle in degrees. If left at null, will default to the angle towards the target.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile.acceleration
member.summary: The internal acceleration in units per (0.03125).

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile.Acceleration
member.summary:
The acceleration in units per second.
This is used to make adjustments to the trajectory.

member.name: F:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile.maximumSpeed
member.summary: The internal maximum speed in units per (0.03125).

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.MomentumMissile.MaximumSpeed
member.summary: The maximum speed in units per second.

member.name: T:WCSharp.Missiles.OrbitalMissile
member.summary:
Missile that will orbit the specified target.
Note: this missile calls when the target dies.

members.member:
The speed of the missile. Defined in units per second.
Use negative values to go clockwise.
This can be used instead of , and will ensure a consistent units per second speed through adjustments.
this.speed is only used to store the desired speed for if the range is adjusted later on. Actual speed is always in radians per tick, determined by this.orbitalVelocity.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.OrbitalMissile.Range
member.summary:
The distance at which the orbits from the origin.
The speed of the missile after a range adjustment is determined by whether it was set via or .

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.OrbitalMissile.OrbitalPeriod
member.summary:
The amount of time it takes to make one rotation in seconds.
Use negative values to go clockwise.
This can be used instead of , and will ensure a consistent orbital period through adjustments.

member.name: P:WCSharp.Missiles.OrbitalMissile.InitialAngle
member.summary: The initial angle in degrees at which this missile is created. If left at null, will use a random angle.
